name: offline-news-api
description: Simple RESTful API that allows you to get news either item by item or as an array of items.

scripts.test: npm run jshint && npm run lintspaces && mocha
scripts.local-rss-server: static --port 8081 test # used for offline development
scripts.local-server: node index.js --local # used for offline development
scripts.release: [[ "v1.0.1" =~ ^v[0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+$ ]]; echo $?; if [[ "$CI_BRANCH" =~ ^v[0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+$ ]]; then haikro release --repository matthew-andrews/offline-news-api --github-token $GITHUB_AUTH_TOKEN --tag $CI_BRANCH; else echo 'skipping release'; fi

author: Matt Andrews <matt@mattandre.ws>
